get.summary: Get all actors (User inserted in the record of processing activities)

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of the result page (default: 20, max 500)

parameters.name: filters
parameters.description:
A serialized as json filter string using the JsonRuleEngine.net format
https://github.com/antoinebidault/JsonRuleEngine.Net
The filters is a query param, that's why he must be properly serialized as a json string and url encoded
e.g. {"field":"ProcessingType", "operator":"notEqual", "value": "Done"}
The field prop must match one property name of the object (present in the output results)
The operator can be equal,
notEqual,
lessThan,
lessThanInclusive,
greaterThan,
greaterThanInclusive,
in,
notIn,
contains,
doesNotContains,
isNull,
isNotNull,
isEmpty
You can combine the filters as following : 
{ "separator":"Or","rules": [{"field":"ProcessingType", "operator":"notEqual", "value": "Done"},{"field":"ProcessingType", "operator":"isNull"}]}
Serialize the filter param as following:
?filters=${uriEncodeComponent(JSON.stringify({"field":"ProcessingType", "operator":"notEqual", "value": "Done"}))}

patch.summary: Batch delete using a delete + a body param

get.summary: Get a single actor with his id

parameters.name: select
parameters.description: Fields to select, leave empty you will catch all the fields (Tags,Attachments,Creator

delete.summary: Remove the actor with his id

post.summary: Export the actors as a dpa
Export the actors in any format

e.g. {"field":"ProcessingType", "operator":"notEqual", "value": "Done"}
The field prop must match one property name of the object (present in the output results)
The operator can be equal,
notEqual,
lessThan,
lessThanInclusive,
greaterThan,
greaterThanInclusive,
in,
notIn,
contains,
doesNotContains,
isNull,
isNotNull,
isEmpty
You can combine the filters as following : 
{ "separator":"Or","rules": [{"field":"ProcessingType", "operator":"notEqual", "value": "Done"},{"field":"ProcessingType", "operator":"isNull"}]}
Serialize the filter param as following:
?filters=${uriEncodeComponent(JSON.stringify({"field":"ProcessingType", "operator":"notEqual", "value": "Done"}))}
